pr_title: Change LabelSet creation to use varargs, rather than overloaded k/v methods.

timeline.message: update the sdk to handle the varargs option
rename a variable to make more sense

timeline.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: Hm. I guess having at least one of more than a single pair would be useful. Beyond that, it seems like the value will be very low, since varargs is varargs. I'll put the 2-key version back.
replies.author: jkwatson

timeline.message: add back a test with 2 key/value pairs

timeline.bodyText: Do we need this method anymore?
timeline.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: We could definitely get rid of it, if we have varargs, but I suspect there might be API usages that would want to have a static Map around to use. I'd like to get some feedback on the varargs option before we remove the Map option. We could also get rid of the empty method, since you can just call the varargs one with no arguments to get the empty LabelSet back.
replies.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: Definitely the empty api does not make that much sense. I am for removing the empty and maybe ask some users for feedback for the map?
replies.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: Sounds good to me. I'll make those changes and update the PR.
replies.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: Do you want to do the changes in this PR or separately?
replies.author: bogdandrutu

timeline.message: replace the emptyLabelSet method with the empty varargs call

timeline.bodyText: We should return a NoopLabelSet to not crash if they call record on a metric with the result of this.
timeline.author: bogdandrutu
